game_description: Piano Master takes the user into the fascinating world of the piano, through a complete learning course. The course contains both written and video lessons, with demos. If you are already a professional, you can play the piano freely, or if you just want to impress you friends, the Famous Songs section is for you. You will be able to sing famous songs easily. You just have to press the keys, we take care of the rest. Piano Master uses hand-tracking for a real feel of the piano. You will be surrounded by a real theatre, so that everything feels like a warm and professional place for playing and learning.
review_1: Very nice game. As a novice piano player, I found the lessons informative and simple. The instructor has a charming accent, and his passion for teaching the piano show through. Iâ€™m only on the first lesson, and have filled in many of the gaps, that my self-teaching method left. With good lighting, your own hands are responsive as controllers. The piano itself is a little too sensitive for me, but that may improve as I get better. Truly the value of this app, far surpasses the $5 cost.
